name: Glider
description:
Glider, the award winning Macintosh game is back.
Fly a paper airplane through a house without landing on an object. Use floor vents to get lift; avoid obstacles in your path....
Simple controls, addictive game play, fun for both kids as well as adults.
Also available for the iPhone and iPad as "Glider Classic".
• The Mac OS X version has double-size artwork that looks stunning on a 27" display.
• Automatically saves game state
• Waypoints allow you to begin a new game at the last waypoint you located in the house
• Support for Retina displays
